title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil the pasta in salted water according to package instructions.
Beat the eggs and mix with grated cheese.
Combine pasta with pancetta, then stir in the egg and cheese mixture off the heat.
Serve immediately with extra cheese and black pepper.
